required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Deep Learning Magnetic Resonance Imaging Radiomic Predict Platinum-sensitive in Patients With Epithelial Ovarian Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Deep Learning Magnetic Resonance Imaging Radiomic Predict Platinum-sensitive in Patients With Epithelial Ovarian Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-Sen University

clinical_study.source: Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-Sen University

brief_summary.textblock: Platinum-sensitive is an important basis for the treatment of recurrent epithelial ovarian cancer (EOC) without effective methods to predict.We aimed to develop and validate the EOC deep learning system to predict the platinum-sensitive of EOC patients through analysis of enhanced magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) images before initial treatment.Ninety-three EOC patients received platinum-based chemotherapy (>= 4 cycles) and debulking surgery from Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hospitalin China from January 2011 to January 2020 were enrolled. This deep-learning EOC signature achieved a high predictive power for platinum-sensitive, and the signature based on MRI whole volume is better than that on primary tumor area only.

intervention.description: Different radiomic and machine learning strategies for radiomic features extraction, sorting features and model constriction

study_pop.textblock: Patients received platinum-based chemotherapy (>= 4 cycles) and debulking surgery from Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hospital in China from January 2011 to January 2020

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- (1)Patients with epithelial ovarian cancer (2 )Patients received platinum-based chemotherapy (>= 4 cycles) and debulking surgery
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with epithelial ovarian cancer received less than 4 cycles platinum-based chemotherapy or no debulking surgery

facility.name: Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-sen University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-Sen University

patient_data.ipd_description: The datasets used or analysed during the current study are available from the corresponding author on reasonable request.
